body.name: All-new Ring Battery Doorbell Pro | Two-Way Talk with Audio+, 3D Motion Detection, and 1536p HD+ Head-to-Toe Video (2024 release)
body.stockDetail: This item will be released on March 6, 2024.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Reducing CO2 products reduce their carbon footprint year after year. Certified by the Carbon Trust.

features: Pro-level features — All-new Battery Doorbell Pro, Ring’s best battery-powered doorbell camera, loaded with cutting-edge features like 1536p Head-to-Toe HD+ Video & 3D Motion Detection with Bird’s Eye Zones and Bird’s Eye View
Head-to-Toe View — Head-to-Toe HD+ Video in 1536p gives you an expanded field of view so you can see more of who's at your front door.
3D Motion Detection — Configure Bird's Eye Zones up to 30' away on an overhead map of your property to pinpoint movement only where it matters.
Low-Light Sight — Our enhanced imaging sensors deliver clarity and clear color that doesn’t quit after the sun goes down—only on Battery Doorbell Pro.

Person + Package Alerts — Know when a package is delivered with Package Alerts, an exclusive Ring Protect subscription feature (sold separately) that notifies you when your package is detected within a specified zone.
Convenient Power — Powered by a Quick Release Battery Pack for quick and easy recharging.
Works with Alexa — Connect with Alexa on compatible Echo devices to enable announcements and Two-Way Talk for convenient in-home monitoring.

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: 5.1 in. x 2.4 in x 1.1 in (128mm x 62mm x 28mm)

productInformation.name: Video
productInformation.value: 1536p HD+ Video, Live View, Color Night Vision

productInformation.name: Motion Detection
productInformation.value: 3D Motion Detection with Bird’s Eye Zones and Bird's Eye View

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: Rechargeable Battery Pack (included), optional solar panel, plug-in adapter (sold separately)

productInformation.name: Connectivity
productInformation.value: Requires a minimum upload speed of 2 Mbps for optimal performance.

productInformation.name: Operating Conditions
productInformation.value: -4°F to 122°F (-20°C to 50°C) (prolonged exposure to direct sunlight and other conditions may increase the temperature of your device and affect performance)

productInformation.name: Dual Power Mode
productInformation.value: Dynamic switching between plug-in and battery power modes (requires purchase of plug-in adapter)

productInformation.name: Setup Requirements
productInformation.value: Only if wiring in: Standard doorbell system with 8-24 VAC, 40VA max, 50/60Hz doorbell transformer

productInformation.name: Box Includes
productInformation.value: Battery Doorbell Pro Rechargeable, Quick-Release Battery Pack Satin Nickel Faceplate Corner Kit USB Charging Cable Installation Tools Device Setup Guide Warranty Safety Language Security Sticker

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

productInformation.name: Disclaimers
productInformation.value: 1Ring Alarm and all Ring Alarm accessories require a subscription for digital notifications, in-app features, digital arming/disarming, and integration with other Ring, Echo, and third party products. Subscription sold separately. View ring.com/protect-plans for pricing and details. 2Find details on Ring Protect Plans below. See https://ring.com/protect-plans for more information. Terms and conditions apply. Video History, Saving, and Sharing Your Ring videos in the cloud are stored temporarily, up to 180 days. Changing your video storage time will only affect videos that are recorded after you adjust your storage time setting. Snapshot Capture photos in the cloud are stored up to 7 days.
